articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: US sportswriter Grant Wahl dies while covering World Cup game in Qatar - Sky Sports
articles.description: American sportswriter Grant Wahl has died while covering the World Cup in Qatar, his family and US Soccer have said.
articles.content:
American sportswriter Grant Wahl has died while covering the World Cup in Qatar, his family and US Soccer have said.
Mr Wahl, a former Sports Illustrated journalist who later moved to Substack, died… [+4420 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: US sports reporter dies after collapsing at Qatar World Cup - News24
articles.description: One of America's leading soccer reporters, who made headlines when he was detained at the Qatar World Cup for wearing a rainbow shirt, died Friday while covering the quarter finals in Doha, according to his wife and the US Soccer federation.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: China promises to buy more Middle East oil, urges Arab leaders to replace the dollar with yuan - ABC News
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping vows to import more oil and natural gas from energy-rich Gulf Arab states while not interfering in their affairs, likely seeking to cast Beijing in a more favourable light than Washington as America's attention in the region wanes.

articles.title: US journo dead in Qatar after being detained - news.com.au
articles.description: Influential American soccer journalist Grant Wahl died in Qatar while covering the World Cup, his wife has confirmed. He was 48.
articles.content:
Influential American soccer journalist Grant Wahl died in Qatar while covering the World Cup, his wife has confirmed. He was 48.
